about_the_game:
After the battles she once fought against her enemies, Helga at last knows peace. A new deal with the king has provided the Vikings with land in England, and she is among those who settle down to live a new life. Unfortunately, this peace is not to last…

When betrayal leads to the death of a hero, Helga and the young Viking leader Ivar find themselves faced with new enemies and overwhelming odds. Ivar is determined to defeat his enemies by any means necessary, and he begins amass an army.

But is allying with him in this war the right decision to make? And what will come later, after the two sides have clashed in battle?

- A thrilling adventure of a Viking warrior
- Challenging match-3 puzzles to solve
- 20 upgrades to unlock as Helga pursues her mission
- New characters to meet and locations to visit
- 5 chapters to enjoy alongside a legendary Viking warrior
